programs.title: Child Education & Literacy
programs.shortDescription: Breaking barriers to education for underprivileged children across rural India.
programs.description: Our education program provides comprehensive learning support to children from economically disadvantaged backgrounds. We run learning centers in remote villages, provide scholarships to bright students, distribute educational materials, and support schools with infrastructure development. Our digital literacy initiatives ensure children are prepared for the modern world.
features: Computer training and digital literacy programs
Free textbooks and educational materials distribution

programs.title: Community Health Services
programs.shortDescription: Bringing quality healthcare to India's most underserved communities.
programs.description: We organize comprehensive medical camps in rural areas where healthcare access is limited. Our mobile health units provide free consultations, diagnostic services, and essential medicines. We focus on preventive care, maternal and child health, vaccination drives, and health education to build healthier communities.
features: Health awareness workshops on hygiene and nutrition
Mobile medical units for remote areas

programs.title: Women's Empowerment & Livelihood
programs.shortDescription: Empowering women through skill development and economic independence.
programs.description: Our women's empowerment program provides vocational training, entrepreneurship development, and financial literacy to help women become economically independent. We establish self-help groups (SHGs), provide micro-credit support, and create market linkages for their products. Our focus is on building confident, skilled women who can lead their families and communities.
features: Tailoring, handicraft, and beauty training courses

programs.title: Sustainable Agriculture Development
programs.shortDescription: Supporting farmers with modern techniques and sustainable farming practices.
programs.description: We work with small and marginal farmers to improve agricultural productivity through modern farming techniques, organic practices, and water conservation methods. Our program includes training on sustainable agriculture, providing quality seeds, facilitating market linkages, and promoting climate-resilient farming practices to ensure better income for farming families.
features: Organic farming and pesticide-free cultivation training
Quality seed distribution and soil testing
Drip irrigation and water conservation techniques
Direct market linkages for better prices

programs.title: Housing & Disaster Relief
programs.shortDescription: Building safe homes and providing emergency support during crises.
programs.description: We construct low-cost, disaster-resistant houses for homeless and disaster-affected families. During natural calamities, our team provides immediate relief through food, water, temporary shelter, and medical aid. We also support post-disaster rehabilitation to help communities rebuild their lives with dignity.
features: Emergency relief during floods, earthquakes, cyclones
Distribution of food, water, and essentials

programs.title: Water, Sanitation & Hygiene
programs.shortDescription: Ensuring access to clean water and promoting hygiene in rural communities.
programs.description: We implement water and sanitation projects to ensure communities have access to safe drinking water and proper sanitation facilities. Our initiatives include installing hand pumps and water purification systems, constructing toilets under Swachh Bharat Mission, and conducting hygiene awareness campaigns to promote community health and dignity.
features: Hand pump installation and water source development
Water quality testing and purification systems
